SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.communication.rmi

Interface RMIServer

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIServerApp
public interface RMIServer extends Remote
The RMIServer interface defines the remote methods that can be called by the client in the server.

      numPlayersGame - num of players of new game

      Parameters:
      client - RMI client that joins
      player - player's name
      numPlayersGame - num of players of new game
      idFirstPlayer - first player's id
